text: Pope Gregory may mean: * Pope Gregory I (590-604), also called Gregory the Great * Pope Gregory II (715-731) * Pope Gregory III (731-741) * Pope Gregory IV (827-844) * Pope Gregory V (996-999) * Pope Gregory VI (1045-1046) *: Antipope Gregory VI * Pope Gregory VII (1073-1085), Hildebrand * Pope Gregory VIII (1187) *: Antipope Gregory VIII * Pope Gregory IX (1227-1241) * Pope Gregory X (1271-1276) * Pope Gregory XI (1370-1378) * Pope Gregory XII (1406-1415) * Pope Gregory XIII (1572-1585), known for the Gregorian calendar * Pope Gregory XIV (1590-1591) * Pope Gregory XV (1621-1623) * Pope Gregory XVI (1831-1846) Gregory
title: Pope Gregory
